title: If the holder / owner of the property needs to build this 50% component at some other location(s) within the same TOD zone / circle, the difference between rate of sale of tenements as mentioned in Annual Statement of Rates shall be paid by the developer to the Municipal Corporation as premium
clause_text: If the holder / owner of the property needs to build this 50% component at some other location(s) within the same TOD zone / circle, the difference between rate of sale of tenements as mentioned in Annual Statement of Rates shall be paid by the developer to the Municipal Corporation as premium.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
